comments:
Bind a dataSet to a data item, select one column in Data Column binding, BIRT throws error message

Steps to reproduce:

1. Create a dataSource from Sample DB
2. Create a dataSet from CUSTOMER
3. In outline view, insert a data item
4. Bind it to the dataSet
5. Select one column name in Data Column binding

Expected result:
The column can be selected.

Actual result:
System directly throws error message as following:
java.lang.NullPointerException

Exception Stack Tree:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ColumnViewer$1.getCellEditor(ColumnViewer.java:175)

When I works on Steps 4, at first, the focus is lost. Binding perspective is grey. So I select the data item in layout to identify whether  the columns are bound to the data item and it does.

I also found that the problem disapeared only when I selected the area of the column "Aggregate On" in Data Column Binding.

After preview, I get error message as following:

Data cccghhj: 
- There are errors evaluating script "row["data item"]".
